title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 83.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 83.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the responsibility and the intent of the State

Department of Civil Service to adopt regulations pursuant to the HIV and AIDS
Related Information Act (Public Health Law, article 27-F). All officers, employees and agents of the department shall at all times maintain the
confidentiality of any HIV related information in their possession, in
accordance with the requirements of the statute and these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
83.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
